item.title: 41 bodies allegedly used for meditation found at monastery
item.description: The head of the Phichit province monastery told a local TV station that the use of corpses was part of a "meditation technique" he developed.

item.title: How Kenya became the "Silicon Savannah"
item.description: The tech hub of East Africa, Kenya—and Nairobi in particular—is looking to solve an impending jobs crisis through innovation.
